document.ModsDocTitle: Ichthyofauna of the Kubo, Tochikura, and Ichinono river systems (Kitakami River drainage, northern Japan), with a comparison of predicted and surveyed species richness

subSubSection.paragraph: This species was recorded from fast currents of the lotic environments, but larvae and juveniles were sometimes recorded from slower flowing parts of the rivers.
